articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: DK's brutal 'Champions Trophy final' reminder after Pakistan A crush India A - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India A lost by 128 runs to Pakistan A in the final of the Men's Emerging Asia Cup in Colombo.  | Cricket
articles.content: India A may have gone into the final of the Emerging Asia Cup against Pakistan A as favourites but the result was as far away from it as it could be. The Yash Dhull-led side were completely outclasse… [+1858 chars]
